SPANISH.LANGUAGE CHOICE: Escriba 1 for English o 2 para Español:
SPANISH.ERROR: Se ha producido un error. Póngase en contacto con el servicio de atención al cliente.
SPANISH.CHOOSE A PROFILE: Si eres un jugador que regresa, elige un perfil arriba o escribe un nombre nuevo para crear un perfil nuevo.
SPANISH.INVALID INPUT: Esa entrada no fue reconocida. Vuelva a intentarlo.
SPANISH.BOARD CHOICE: Would you like to use the default board or the winners board? Type 'show boards' to see both boards.

ENGLISH.WELCOME: Welcome to the Tic Tac Toe Simulator.
ENGLISH.LANGUAGE CHOICE: Please type in 1 for English or 2 para Español:
ENGLISH.ERROR: An error has occured. Please contact customer support.
ENGLISH.CHOOSE A PROFILE: If you are a returning player choose a profile above, or type in a new name to create a new profile.
ENGLISH.INVALID INPUT: That input wasn't recognized. Please try again.
ENGLISH.BOARD CHOICE: Would you like to use the default board or the winners board? Type 'show boards' to see both boards.
ENGLISH.CONTINUE CHOICE: Would you like to resume your previous game, or would you like to start a new one?
ENGLISH.EXIT STATEMENT: Thank you for playing Tic Tac Toe. Please come again soon.
